name: netalertx
description: NetAlertX is a network scanning and monitoring tool designed for self-hosting. It visualizes devices, alerts users when new devices connect, and integrates with Home Assistant for network awareness.
features: Network scanning: Automatically discover all devices connected to your local network.
Device alerts: Receive notifications when new or unknown devices join the network.
Device identification: Recognize device types, manufacturers, and hostnames from network data.
Historical tracking: View connection history and track when devices were last seen.
Home Assistant integration: Send device presence data to Home Assistant for automation triggers.
Custom notifications: Configure alerts via email, webhooks, or push services for network events.
Device grouping: Organize devices by type, location, or custom categories for easier management.
MAC address tracking: Monitor devices by hardware address even when IP addresses change.
Port scanning: Detect open ports and services running on network devices.
Network visualization: View topology and device relationships in an interactive dashboard.
Scheduled scans: Run network discovery on intervals or specific times for continuous monitoring.
Blocklist management: Flag suspicious devices and track potential security threats on your network.
